content: ** how to get the pattern for free ** *choose what you pay use code halfoffsocks for 50% off this pattern or use code freesocks to get this pattern for free codes work on all sock patterns from my ravelry store * scrappy socks to make with your advent calendar or any fingering weight scraps * do you have a yarn advent this year but not enough time to make a large project * do you have a lot of leftovers or scraps of sock yarn * do you want to do a knitting challenge in december leading up to the holidays i ll be joining in too and challenging myself to knit a mini stripe pair one stripe every day of december 2024 to match my medium stripe pair follow my progress on my youtube channel 1 @maanknitwear **needles** any fingering sock needle that gives you gauge i recommend 2 mm us 0 2 25 mm us 1 or 2 5 mm us 1 5 needles this pattern is written for magic loop sock knitting but you can definitely knit it as well using dpns or small circulars **gauge** 32 sts x 44 row = 10 x 10 cm or 4 x 4 inches **yarn** there s a table in the pattern to decide on the amount of stripes for your size *for the medium stripe version you ll need* * 10-16 different scraps of any fingering weight sock yarn of ~4 g each * yarn for your cuff heel and toes 20 g maximum or make these scrappy too you ll need a little under 7 g for each of the three *for the mini stripe version you ll need* * 16-28 different scraps of any fingering weight sock yarn of ~2 g each * yarn for your cuff heel and toes 20 g maximum or make these scrappy too you ll need a little under 7 g for each of the three 1 https //www youtube com/channel/ucytuwxflboml7dnssygbxmg
